channel.title: ham radio on Kevin's corner of the web
channel.description: Recent content in ham radio on Kevin's corner of the web

item.title: Getting Started with Ham Radio
item.description: One of the goals on my bucket list has been getting my Ham radio license. I don’t remember, really, when it first landed on my list. I was a teen and it most likely was the result of some movie I saw or book I read that extolled the use and excitement of reaching out to the world through radio. The desire wasn’t helped, I’m sure, by having an uncle that got into it after he retired.
